messages.subject: Re: Enjoying the conference CDs!
messages.msgSnippet: I paid for a download of one lecture from the conference too, and have found it VERY helpful.  But for the life of me I can t work out how to save it on to my
messages.messageBody:
I paid for a download of one lecture from the conference too, and have
found it VERY helpful. But for the life of me I can't work out how to
save it on to my computer. When I click on the link, it doesn't open
another window that says "Save as"; it just starts straight into the
lecture. Any clues on what I'm doing wrong? I know it will disappear
from my account in 5 days or so, and I really want to save a copy
before then.

Thanks, Karen

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Enjoying the conference CDs!
messages.msgSnippet: ~Kelly I m so glad you re enjoying them! Kelly Lovejoy Conference Coordinator Live and Learn Unschooling Conference http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org ...
messages.messageBody:
~Kelly
I'm so glad you're enjoying them!


Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org

-----Original Message-----
From: Jennifer <beanmommy2@...>

I've never been to a L&L Conference (yet!) but the
last couple days I've been re-listening to the discs I
ordered from 2005.

Wow, I've been enjoying them. Yesterday I listened to
Sandra and Ren's talk on Mindful Parenting. Right now
I'm sipping some tea and listening to Danielle Conger.

Maybe tomorrow if I have time I'll listen to Pam and
Roya together!

My husband has been asking me what I want for
Christmas, and I just him this link:

http://liveandlearnshop.com/catalog/index.php?main_page=index&cPath=18_21_29


Thanks for letting us enjoy the conference even when
we're unable to attend! :)

Jenny

messages.subject: Enjoying the conference CDs!
messages.msgSnippet: I ve never been to a L&L Conference (yet!) but the last couple days I ve been re-listening to the discs I ordered from 2005. Wow, I ve been enjoying them.
messages.messageBody:
I've never been to a L&L Conference (yet!) but the
last couple days I've been re-listening to the discs I
ordered from 2005.

Wow, I've been enjoying them. Yesterday I listened to
Sandra and Ren's talk on Mindful Parenting. Right now
I'm sipping some tea and listening to Danielle Conger.

Maybe tomorrow if I have time I'll listen to Pam and
Roya together!

My husband has been asking me what I want for
Christmas, and I just him this link:

http://liveandlearnshop.com/catalog/index.php?main_page=index&cPath=18_21_29


Thanks for letting us enjoy the conference even when
we're unable to attend! :)

Jenny
